notes: Retail (new) and total installed (existing) cost for min. efficiency ASHPs in 2023
For existing buildings, additional tank removal costs of 800 2014$ (975 2022$) are applied for distillate and propane based on the 2015 EIA report, updating the cost from April 2014 to April 2022.
